 2012-07212012-05-31CH,  ,  ,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of DEENA GRANOT of Toronto, Ontario, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum for Human Rights to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Yves Laberge.
AttachmentsAttachment
